title: MISSI DOMINICI T01-T03 (2009-2012) (Dragonz) English scanlations
description:
In the chaotic Middle Ages, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a child with extraordinary gifts: Jelami, the Zodiac Child.

They are the Missi Dominici, charged with bringing to Rome all the holy relics scattered around the world. Except that the young Ronan Chantilly Wyrm and brutal Ernst Wolfram Christians seem very strange... actually not very Catholic.

Meanwhile, in a medieval village, that nothing should differentiate it from other, Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse torture and burn every living soul. Their goal: to find the Zodiac Child. A teenager said to be invested with amazing magical powers. A teenager who might also be interested in Wurm and Wolfram, whose talents were hidden, it seems, way inferior to those horsemen of the Apocalypse. Actually old acquaintances...

Magic. Mystery. Violence. Elegance of the line of action and unbridled Dellac Benedict masterfully conducted by Thierry Gloris. Captivating as hell, let yourself be carried away by this brilliant medieval fantasy adventure...
